title: Plat II Support looking for adc DuoQ partner
body:
Hey, just add me in game (kubameister09) if you are at least 16 years old, got a functioning headset and skype or teamspeak. (I prefer skype). I am 19 years old and from Germany. I speak German and English quite fluently, which you should be able to as well (Only one language needed.).
Everything is said 8)

replies.body: Kannst mich adden, wenn du willst. Werde heute aber net mehr on sein. KÃ¶nnen ja mal schauen ob es passt. =)
